title: FAQ
intro: Answers to common questions — quick and practical.

items.q: How do I create an account?
items.a: Click Sign up in the top-right, enter your email, and follow the verification steps.
Use the Support page to find our email and phone options, or open a ticket via the Help Center.

items.q: Where can I find the privacy policy?
items.a: The privacy policy is available at /privacy-policy and includes details about data handling.
